component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Default task
set up the staticfiles dir. create a basic html and css. add new func in views in order to render the html
create style for landing page
create the basic html and css for the template
create the base html in order to let other pages extend it
Separate the the template and content to increase the code reusing and clear the structure.
create database model and connect with mysql database
register models in admin and set up each model
add third party rich-text editor plug in
create upload file url and path to implement file upload function
add the template tags and filters to show categroy and article properly
create paginator for the recent post
create post list and side widgets to show all posts and widgets on the post page
able to display the article archive in side widget
Restructure the template files to split each page to smaller parts
get the year and month from http request in order to read the proper archives from database
Click post link will send request of article with article id. Get article by id from database and send it to the article.html so we the matched article will display

Create comment form in order to send the comment data to store in database. The comment will display under each article with required article id. The comment system is from Django itself but I embed bootstrap style with it.
create children comment inside the parent comment
create about me html and tag cloud side widget
